history.content:
Hello everyone!

 

I hope everyone is having a great summer break! We're looking for students at UC Berkeley who have taken Data 8, received a B or better, are passionate about the course, and have the potential to become tutors and UGSIs in future semesters.

 

Deadline: Tuesday, 8/27 at 11:59pm
Orientation: Tuesday, 9/3 at 10am - 11am
First lab with learning assistants: Wednesday, Thursday, Friday 9/4 - 9/6

 

Learning assistants will work for 3 hr/week. The breakdown of the 3 hours consists of:
- 0.5 hour of preparation (e.g. doing the weekly lab ahead of time, consulting with the (U)GSI, etc.)
- 2 hours of assisting in lab

- 0.5 hour for pedagogy practice/reflection a week (online in bCourses)

 

Please note that starting this Fall, the EECS department is also requiring all academic interns to be enrolled in mandatory 1-unit bCourses online section (20-30 minute per week for reflections + pedagogy support).

There will be an EECS-wide Academic Intern Orientation (it will be postponed from the original date stated/TBD).

 

3 hr/week translates to 1 P/NP teaching unit with Professor Ramesh Sridharan.

 

Please apply here with your @berkeley.edu email address once you have finalized your Fall 2019 schedule if you're interested!

 

Link: https://forms.gle/bG9gxq9tKZtPK5jc9

 

If you have any questions, feel free to send them to Tamara Vilaythong (tvilayth@berkeley.edu).
